mapper.select: select username, zipcode, addr, detailaddr, tel, email from member where userid=#{param1}
select * from point where userid=#{param1} and pointNo=(select max(pointNo) from point)
select cpnname, apply, available, salerate, to_char(cpnstart, 'yyyy-mm-dd') cpnstart, to_char(cpnend, 'yyyy-mm-dd') cpnend from coupon where userid=#{param1} and cpnend>=sysdate-1
select count(cpnNo) from coupon where userid=#{param1} and cpnend>=sysdate-1
mapper.insert: insert into orderTbl(orderno, orderdate, userid, arr, arrtel, arrzipcode, arraddr, arrdetailaddr, request, pluspoint, usepoint, usecoupon, totalprice) values(#{orderno}, sysdate, #{userid}, #{arr}, #{arrtel}, #{arrzipcode}, #{arraddr}, #{arrdetailaddr}, #{request}, #{pluspoint}, #{usepoint}, #{usecoupon}, #{totalprice})
insert into suborder(suborderno, orderno, pno, pname, quantity, subprice) values(subordersq.nextval, #{orderno}, #{pno}, #{pname}, #{quantity}, #{subprice})
mapper.select: select suborderno, orderno, p.pno, p.pname, optno, quantity, pprice, saleprice, deliveryprice, subprice from suborder s join product p on s.pno=p.pno where orderno=#{param1}
